.. java:import:: it.unicam.cs.pa.mastermind.ui ConsoleStartView

.. java:import:: it.unicam.cs.pa.mastermind.ui StartView

ConsoleStartViewFactory
=======================

.. java:package:: it.unicam.cs.pa.mastermind.factories
   :noindex:

.. java:type:: public class ConsoleStartViewFactory implements StartViewFactory

   Classe factory estensione di \ ``StartViewFactory``\  impiegata per ottenere istanze di \ ``ConsoleStartView``\ .

   :author: Francesco Pio Stelluti, Francesco Coppola

Methods
-------
getStartView
^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. java:method:: @Override public StartView getStartView()
   :outertype: ConsoleStartViewFactory
